message.body: I'm off to giant. Need anything?
Nope
Are u okay?
Yes
Are you at grandmother's?
Yes I was asleep and didn't see your message till now.
You can always call me any time even the middle of the night. That way I can hear the phone. I love you.
Have you seen this http://www.dailydot.com/lol/kids-react-cheerios-commercial-race/
Not yet but I will. Love.
Love you!
I love you too very much. I'll be at the house tomorrow morning.
I want to go to Maine
Soraya I am so very happy that you like dr hunt. You Deserve that wonderful gift.
Ugh
I love you. Be strong. These difficulties will be resolved.
I'm having silvertones over on Sunday to sing for Maman and I'd love it if you came
I would like to be there but I don't feel welcome. I would be an unhappy presence and I wouldn't want to spoil it for you.
Did you talk to your mother about it?
No it's very important to me that you do comeb
No. Ugh nevermind do whatever I don't care

I'm very sorry honey. I think she wouldn't want me to be there because she has made it clear she doesn't want to see me or talk to me. If she agrees that it is alright for me to be there I will come just for the singing part. I love you. I am very happy and proud that you invites them over.
Invited
Mom says you're welcome. you don't have to come I just don't want there to be such a divide
If you want me to come I will and will put on a reasonably happy face what time will it be?
I don't want you to put on a face I want you to be happy :(
Ha ha
Fine whatever
I need to stop parenting both of you it's unfair I don't care what you do
I'll be there
###### if you want me to come to the concert I will but I need to have you confirm that.
I do
Ok I'll be there. Thanks for the invitation.
